testInfo.name: Gesamtfragenkatalog zum Test „Leben in Deutschland“ und zum „Einbürgerungstest“

questions.germanQuestion: Welches Wappen gehört zum Bundesland Brandenburg?
questions.englishQuestion: Which coat of arms belongs to the state of Brandenburg?
questions.notes: The coat of arms of Brandenburg features a red eagle, which is a historic symbol of the region.
questions.learningTechniques: Familiarize yourself with Brandenburg's coat of arms, which prominently features a red eagle.

resources.description: Learn more about the coat of arms of Brandenburg.

questions.germanQuestion: Welches ist ein Landkreis in Brandenburg?
questions.englishQuestion: Which is a district (Landkreis) in Brandenburg?
questions.notes: Prignitz is a district in Brandenburg, located in the northwestern part of the state.
questions.learningTechniques: Familiarize yourself with the districts of Brandenburg, especially Prignitz, which is an important rural area.

resources.description: Learn more about the districts of Brandenburg.

questions.germanQuestion: Für wie viele Jahre wird der Landtag in Brandenburg gewählt?
questions.englishQuestion: For how many years is the state parliament (Landtag) in Brandenburg elected?
questions.notes: The state parliament (Landtag) in Brandenburg is elected for a term of 5 years.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that the term length for the Landtag in Brandenburg is 5 years, similar to most other German states.

resources.description: Learn more about the political system in Brandenburg.

questions.germanQuestion: Ab welchem Alter darf man in Brandenburg bei Kommunalwahlen wählen?
questions.englishQuestion: At what age can you vote in local elections in Brandenburg?
questions.notes: In Brandenburg, citizens can participate in local elections starting at the age of 16.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that 16 is the voting age for local elections in Brandenburg, which is the same as in several other German states.

resources.description: Learn more about voting rights in Brandenburg.

questions.germanQuestion: Welche Farben hat die Landesflagge von Brandenburg?
questions.englishQuestion: What are the colors of the state flag of Brandenburg?
questions.notes: The state flag of Brandenburg consists of the colors red and white, with a red eagle emblem.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember the red and white colors of Brandenburg's flag, which are associated with the historic red eagle of the region.

resources.description: Learn more about the flag of Brandenburg.

questions.germanQuestion: Wo können Sie sich in Brandenburg über politische Themen informieren?
questions.englishQuestion: Where can you get information on political topics in Brandenburg?

options.germanOption: bei der Landeszentrale für politische Bildung
options.englishOption: at the State Center for Civic Education

questions.notes: In Brandenburg, the 'Landeszentrale für politische Bildung' (State Center for Civic Education) is the primary resource for information on political topics.
questions.learningTechniques: Focus on the role of the 'Landeszentrale für politische Bildung' in educating the public about political matters in Brandenburg.

resources.description: Learn more about the State Center for Civic Education in Brandenburg.

questions.englishQuestion: The state capital of Brandenburg is called …
questions.notes: The state capital of Brandenburg is Potsdam, known for its historic palaces and parks.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that Potsdam is the capital of Brandenburg, a city renowned for its cultural heritage and proximity to Berlin.

resources.description: Learn more about Potsdam, the capital of Brandenburg.

questions.notes: Brandenburg is located in northeastern Germany, surrounding the capital city of Berlin.
questions.learningTechniques: Familiarize yourself with Brandenburg's location as one of the states in eastern Germany, closely connected with Berlin.

resources.description: Learn more about the geography of Brandenburg.

questions.germanQuestion: Wie nennt man die Regierungschefin/den Regierungschef in Brandenburg?
questions.englishQuestion: What is the title of the head of government in Brandenburg?
questions.notes: The head of government in Brandenburg is called the 'Ministerpräsidentin' or 'Ministerpräsident,' a title used for the leaders of most German federal states.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that the title 'Minister-President' is used in German federal states like Brandenburg for the head of government.

resources.description: Learn more about the role of the Minister-President in Brandenburg.

questions.germanQuestion: Welche Ministerin/welchen Minister hat Brandenburg nicht?
questions.englishQuestion: Which minister does Brandenburg not have?
questions.notes: Brandenburg, like other German states, does not have a Foreign Minister ('Außenminister'), as foreign affairs are managed at the federal level.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that federal states in Germany do not have foreign ministers, as foreign policy is the responsibility of the federal government.

resources.description: Learn more about the political structure of German states.
